title: Launch Version 8 (surface app version in UI)

requirements.summary: Define a single app version constant set to "8" and surface it on Settings and the desktop footer in AppLayout.
acceptanceCriteria: The app defines a single source of truth for the app version (e.g., a constant exported from a small module) set to "8".
The Settings page displays the version as English text (e.g., "Version 8").
The desktop footer (in AppLayout) also displays the version as English text (e.g., "Instabook · Version 8" or "Version 8").
The version text renders without breaking layout on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create a small constants module that exports a single source of truth for the app version (set to "8"), e.g., an exported constant used across the UI.
Import the app version constant and display it on the Settings page as English text (e.g., "Version 8"), laid out responsively so it does not break on mobile or desktop.
Import the app version constant and display it in the desktop footer as English text (e.g., "Instabook · Version 8"), ensuring the footer layout remains stable across screen sizes.
